text: is a stadium in Aomori, Aomori Prefecture, Japan. The stadium holds 10,010 people. The stadium was built in 1950 and was repaired in 2000. On June 28, 1950, Hideo Fujimoto pitched a perfect game at the stadium. The stadium is not regularly used for Nippon Professional Baseball, but for high school baseball. == External links == * Aomori City Baseball Stadium Aomori Stadium Category:Sports venues in Aomori (city) Category:Sports venues completed in 1950
title: Aomori City Baseball Stadium
